div.p: This study was funded by the Discovery Program of the Australian Research Council (ARC grant DP110101207 and DP150102903 to L. Beheregaray and L. Bernatchez). L. Beheregaray also acknowledges support from ARC FT130101068. We thank Leo O'Reilly for assistance with sampling and Hillary Mahon, Leslie Morrison and Simon Westergaard for contributing to fish husbandry. Animal ethical approval was received from Flinders University (AWC E342).
